page.title: 12Schools In Highworth.
page.content: Everybody starts school at the age of 5 yrs.They go to juniors at 7yrs.At 11 yrs they go to comprehensive school until they are 16 yrs. Schools start at 9am and finish at 3pm or 3.30pm. Most schools have a hall but the secondary school has 3; 1 for eating, 1 for assemblies and 1 for gym. { A BOY'S DAY AT SCHOOL I arrive at school at 5 mins to 9. First we have assembly and then an hour of maths. Playtime lasts 15 minutes and after that we have private reading. The teacher often reads us a story and then we do English. I go home for dinner which lasts an hour. After dinner we do topic or art,music, P.E. or games. I do not have to wear school uniform but some do.
